field.name: summary
field.value: SecurityException in medium trust when proxying types from strongly named assemblies

field.name: description
field.value:
When proxying types from strongly named asseblies DP tries to create a strongly named assembly, which causes SecurityException under medium trust.
See http://support.castleproject.org/projects/AR/issues/view/AR-ISSUE-272 (this issue is duplication of the other one, but I have no rights to move it to DP where it belongs)
